data.name: Brumm Demo
data.detailed_description:
In the spirit of old arcade classics like Super Sprint and old computer racers like Micro Machines, you race on a topdown track with up to two (five in the full version) players in front of your computer (online matches available in full version).

Local multiplayer


Race your friends with full controller support in front of the TV. Compete for the best time or annoy each other in action or eliminiation mode.

Online multiplayer (in full version)


You can play a public game online for quick fun, or start a private lobby and invite your friends. Climb to the top of the leaderboards and driver standings!

Single player


Race with AI bots or drive alone to get the best possible time on the local leaderboards.

Game modes


You can race for a better position on the leaderboard in time mode. In the full version you can try to beat your opponents with power ups in action mode. Finally you can drive in elimination mode (also available in fill version) where the player on the last position has only a few seocnds to catch up - maybe the speed power ups can help?!

Features


  • Two different tracks (ten in full version)
  • One game mode: time (action and elimination matches available in full version)
  • Online multiplayer for up to five players in full version
  • Supports keyboard and controllers for up to two (five in full version) local players
  • AIs bots for single player challenges or additonal cars in local multiplayer
  • Local and online (in full version) leaderboards and online driver standings.

data.short_description: In the spirit of old arcade classics like Super Sprint and old computer racers like Micro Machines, you race on a topdown track with up to two players in front of your computer (up to five players and online mode available in full version).

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: AMD or Intel, 1.5GHz+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics or better
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Needs Java 1.7 or newer, a JRE is supplied if you don't have Java installed.
